page.syntax: Output_String as C = *TRANSPOSE(C string,N first_position,N last_position)

argument.name: first_position
argument.description: An integer greater than 0 and less than len(Input_String). Numeric

argument.name: last_position
argument.description: An integer greater than 0 and less than len(Input_String). Numeric

page.discussion: *TRANSPOSE() returns a character string by reversing the characters in the Input_String at positions First_Position and Second_Position.
